sentences: Taluda on raske, kui sa tunned piina.
Ta ei suutnud enam taluda nende kommentaaride allamäge.
context: The Estonian word 'taluda' means to tolerate, bear, or endure something difficult or unpleasant. It is used when someone can accept or withstand pain, discomfort, challenging situations, or annoying behavior without complaining or breaking down. The verb indicates the capacity to remain patient and resilient in the face of adversity.
